abstract.para: BBCalc (Body Building Calculators) is a set of calculators related to body building and fitness topics.

legalnotice.title: Feedback
legalnotice.para: To report a bug or make a suggestion regarding the &app; application or this manual, follow the directions in the BBCalc project page.
